alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 10 at 6:47PM CST until January 11 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR ALL OF THE OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham... Potter...Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall... Armstrong...Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 6 possible. * Timing...From 11 AM Wednesday morning until 8 PM CST Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
